thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Chipmaker Nvidia's revenue surges 34 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Chipmaker Nvidia's revenue surges 34 pct
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Nvidia Corp reported a 34 percent jump in quarterly revenue on Thursday, underpinned by strong demand for its graphics chips used in data centers, gaming devices, self-driving vehicles and in cryptocurrency mining.
The companyâ€™s net income rose to $1.12 billion, or $1.78 per share, in the fourth quarter ended Jan. 28, from $655 million, or 99 cents per share, a year earlier.
Total revenue rose to $2.91 billion from $2.17 billion.
Reporting by Arjun Panchadar in Bengaluru
